job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: With our recent close of our Series A funding Molecule is hiring midtoseniorlevel fullstack engineers As a member of our team youll help us design build and deliver the very best commoditiestrading software on the planetbrbrYoull get to build production grade software using Ruby on Rails React Go Python Postgres Docker Kubernetes and more because we dont shy away from using cool tech in production As a member of our team youll find yourself doing things the right way most of the timebrbrThe problem domain is complex and if you have experience or interest in finance trading statistics or calculus this could be the gig for you Sound interesting Heres some more about the jobbrbrstronguResponsibilitiesbrustrongulliDesign develop and test new features for Molecules nextgen trading platformliliWrite efficient maintainable and reusable code and participate in and support the full continuous delivery pipelineliliWrite and maintain unit and feature tests and review other team members code and testsliliHelp eliminate tech debtliliCollaborate with and mentor team membersliliLearn new technologies and help your teammates learn them tooliliHelp the company grow by
